docs.title: FreeSurfer
docs.description:
FreeSurfer is a software package for the analysis and visualization of neuroimaging data from cross-sectional and longitudinal studies. It is developed by the Laboratory for Computational Neuroimaging at the Martinos Center for Biomedical Imaging.

FreeSurfer provides full processing streams for structural and functional MRI and includes tools for linear and nonlinear registration, cortical and subcortical segmentation, cortical surface reconstruction, statistical analysis of group morphometry, diffusion MRI, PET analysis, and much more. It is also the structural MRI analysis software of choice for the Human Connectome Project.

docs.title: Output Values File
docs.description: File in which to store output values.

docs.title: Target Distances File
docs.description: File containing distances from source to target vertices.
Resample one surface onto another using FreeSurfer

docs.title: Source Subject
docs.description: Name of source subject as found in $SUBJECTS_DIR or ico for icosahedron.

docs.title: Source Value File
docs.description: Path of the file with input values.

docs.title: Source Value XYZ Surface
docs.description: Use xyz of a surface as input.

docs.title: Project Frac
docs.description: Use projected xyz of a surface as input.

docs.title: Project Absolute
docs.description: Use projected xyz absolute of a surface as input.

docs.title: Source Value Tal XYZ Surface
docs.description: Use tal xyz of a surface as input.

docs.title: Source Value Area Surface
docs.description: Use vertex area of a surface as input.

docs.title: Source Value Annot File
docs.description: Map annotation file.

docs.title: Source Value NXyZ Surface
docs.description: Use surface normals of a surface as input.

docs.title: Patch
docs.description: Specify source patch file, target surface and number of dilations.

docs.title: Source Format
docs.description: Source format type string.

docs.title: Register
docs.description: Apply registration file to sval-xyz.

docs.title: Inverse Register
docs.description: Apply inverse registration file to sval-xyz.

docs.title: Source Ico Order
docs.description: Icosahedron order for the source.

docs.title: Target Subject
docs.description: Name of target subject as found in $SUBJECTS_DIR or ico for icosahedron.

docs.title: Target Ico Order
docs.description: Icosahedron order for the target.

docs.title: Target Value File
docs.description: Path of the file in which to store output values.

docs.title: Target Value XYZ Volume
docs.description: Save target value as a surface file with source xyz.

docs.title: Target Format
docs.description: Target format type string.

docs.title: Target Distance File
docs.description: Save distance from source to target vertices.

docs.title: Single Subject
docs.description: Use the same subject for both source and target.

docs.title: Hemisphere
docs.description: Hemisphere for both source and target (lh or rh).

docs.title: Source Hemisphere
docs.description: Hemisphere for source (lh or rh).

docs.title: Target Hemisphere
docs.description: Hemisphere for target (lh or rh).

docs.title: Dual Hemisphere Flag
docs.description: Assume source ?h.?h.surfreg file name.

docs.title: Jacobian Correction Flag
docs.description: Turn on jacobian correction, needed when applying to area or volume.

docs.title: Surface Registration
docs.description: Surface registration for source and target (sphere.reg).

docs.title: Source Surface Registration
docs.description: Source surface registration (sphere.reg).

docs.title: Target Surface Registration
docs.description: Target surface registration (sphere.reg).

docs.title: Mapping Method
docs.description: Method used to map from the vertices in one subject to another (nnfr or nnf).

docs.title: Frame Number
docs.description: Save only nth frame (when using paint output format).

docs.title: FWHM Source
docs.description: Smooth the source to given FWHM.

docs.title: FWHM Target
docs.description: Smooth the target to given FWHM.

docs.title: Input Smoothing Iterations
docs.description: Number of smoothing iterations for input.

docs.title: Output Smoothing Iterations
docs.description: Number of smoothing iterations for output.

docs.title: Cortex Flag
docs.description: Use ?h.cortex.label as a smoothing mask.

docs.title: No Cortex Flag
docs.description: Do NOT use ?h.cortex.label as a smoothing mask (default).

docs.title: Label Source
docs.description: Source smoothing mask.

docs.title: Label Target
docs.description: Target smoothing mask.

docs.title: Multiply Input
docs.description: Multiply the input by the given value.

docs.title: Divide Input
docs.description: Divide the input by the given value.

docs.title: Reshape Flag
docs.description: Reshape output to multiple 'slices'.

docs.title: Reshape Slices Factor
docs.description: Reshape to Nfactor 'slices'.

docs.title: Reshape 3D Flag
docs.description: Reshape fsaverage (ico7) into 42 x 47 x 83.

docs.title: Split Output Flag
docs.description: Output each frame separately.

docs.title: Synthesize Input Flag
docs.description: Replace input with white Gaussian noise.

docs.title: Replace with Ones Flag
docs.description: Replace input with 1s.

docs.title: Normalize Variance Flag
docs.description: Rescale so that stddev=1 (good with --synth).

docs.title: Synthesize Seed
docs.description: Seed for synth (default is auto).

docs.title: Prune Zero Voxels Flag
docs.description: Remove any voxel that is zero in any time point (for smoothing).

docs.title: No Pruning Flag
docs.description: Do not prune (default).

docs.title: Project Surface
docs.description: Project vertices by mag*scale at each vertex.

docs.title: Project Norm
docs.description: Project vertices by distmm at each vertex.

docs.title: Register Difference File
docs.description: Subtract reg2 from --reg (primarily for testing).

docs.title: RMS File
docs.description: Save RMS of reg1-reg2 (primarily for testing).

docs.title: RMS Mask File
docs.description: Compute RMS in mask (primarily for testing).
Resample one surface onto another using FreeSurfer
